member.summary: Gets minimum possible date.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecordParameterObject)
member.summary: Validates record parameters for creation or editing of a new record.
member.param: Parameters of the record to validate.
member.exception: Thrown when recordParameters are null.
Thrown when firstName or lastName is null.
Thrown when firstName or lastName less than 2 or more than 60.
Thrown when firstName or lastName empty or whitespace.
Thrown when dateOfBirth less than "01-01-1950" or more than current date.
Thrown when salary less than 0.
Thrown when record with the specified id isn't found.
